verses.name: Joshua 19:27
verses.text: And turneth toward the sunrising to Beth–dagon, and reacheth to Zebulun, and to the valley of Jiphthah–el toward the north side of Beth–emek, and Neiel, and goeth out to Cabul on the left hand,

verses.name: Joshua 19:28
verses.text: And Hebron, and Rehob, and Hammon, and Kanah, even unto great Zidon;

verses.name: Joshua 19:29
verses.text: And then the coast turneth to Ramah, and to the strong city Tyre; and the coast turneth to Hosah; and the outgoings thereof are at the sea from the coast to Achzib:

verses.name: Joshua 19:30
verses.text: Ummah also, and Aphek, and Rehob: twenty and two cities with their villages.
